examples.example: 帮助别人是一件快乐的事，别人感谢时我会说不客气。

translate.english: Helping others is a happy thing, and when others thank me, I will say "You're welcome".

examples.example: 当朋友夸我厨艺好时，我笑着说不客气。

translate.english: When friends praise my good cooking skills, I smile and say "You're welcome".

examples.example: 当我帮助老爷爷过马路后，他对我说谢谢，我微笑着说不客气。

translate.english: When I helped the old grandpa cross the road, he said thank you to me, and I smiled and said you're welcome.
